subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Support for the addition of new hosts, layouts, and content handlers.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.p: The following example demonstrates the addition of a new content handler to the transit configuration.
subsection.pre: $ transit add handler demo -uri link:plugin:dpml/demo/dpml-handler#1.2.3 Adding content handler: demo Saving to: local:xml:dpml/transit/config
